name: Diamond Crown - Classic Natural - No. 7
additionalNotes: J.C. Newman Cigar Co. released Diamond Crown cigars on the celebration of their 100th anniversary in 1995. The cigar is a super premium made by the Fuente Family with a silky smooth Connecticut Fermented Wrapper. This wrapper, unlike regular wrappers, is fermented twice to give the cigar its distinctive light Rosado color and smooth flavor.Â
